title: Clover No Kuni No Alice - Heart No Kishi
alternative_title: クローバーの国のアリス ~ハートの騎士~ ; Alice in the Country of Clover -Knight of Hearts- ; Wonderful Wonder World - The Country of Clubs - Knight of Hearts
status: クローバーの国のアリス ~ハートの騎士~ ; Alice in the Country of Clover -Knight of Hearts- ; Wonderful Wonder World - The Country of Clubs - Knight of Hearts
description:
Description :
        “… You’re a kind person indeed… That’s why you’ll play right into my hands.” The romance between the Knight of Hearts (Ace) and Alice. The Red Knight is fearsome and refreshing, his true character hidden. Always lost, yet always misleading others, where will he end up next…? Incredibly dangerous, incredibly sweet, a love story of Wonderland. A manga adaptation of the otome game Clover no Kuni no Alice that focuses on Ace.
